title: Disconnected and can't reconnect
body: As soon as I log into the league client it pops up a notification saying something like "an error occurred, you've been disconnected from chat" and I can't look in the shop, at my profile, or crafting, nor play a game. Pls let me know if it is just something that will be hotfixed or a special case.

replies.body: Yeah, there were chat issues happening during this time and some server problems per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Make sure to bookmark the site to stay up to date!  Everything looks to be okay now!
You should always check the issues for the game either on the top of the client or launcher, signified by a /!\ sign or here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ).
